00023 #ifndef _CTK_DMA_COMMON_H
00024 #define _CTK_DMA_COMMON_H

00035 /* DMA transfer alignment & size constants -------------------------------- */
00036 #ifndef DMA_ALIGN_SIZE
00037 #define DMA_MIN_ALIGN_SIZE     (16)   
00038 #define DMA_ALIGN_SIZE         (128)  
00039 #endif /* DMA_ALIGN_SIZE */
00040 
00041 #ifndef MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE
00042 #define MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE_SHIFT  4       /* 16 bytes */
00043 #define MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE_SHIFT  14      /* 16384 bytes */
00044 #define MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE        (1 << MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE_SHIFT)
00045 #define MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE        (1 << MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE_SHIFT)
00046 #define MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE_MASK   (MFC_MIN_DMA_SIZE - 1)
00047 #define MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE_MASK   (MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE - 1)
00048 #define MFC_MIN_DMA_LIST_SIZE   0x0008  /*   8 bytes */
00049 #define MFC_MAX_DMA_LIST_SIZE   0x4000  /* 16K bytes */
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #ifndef DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE
00053 #define DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE   MFC_MAX_DMA_SIZE 
00054 #endif /* DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE */
00055 
00056 #define DMA_ALIGN_DOWN(v)   ALIGN_DOWN(v, DMA_ALIGN_SIZE)
00057 #define DMA_ALIGN_UP(v)     ALIGN_UP(v, DMA_ALIGN_SIZE)
00058 
00059 #ifndef MFC_PUT_CMD
00060 /* MFC DMA Commands -------------------------------------------------------- */
00061 #define MFC_PUT_CMD             0x20
00062 #define MFC_PUTS_CMD            0x28
00063 #define MFC_PUTR_CMD            0x30
00064 #define MFC_PUTF_CMD            0x22
00065 #define MFC_PUTB_CMD            0x21
00066 #define MFC_PUTFS_CMD           0x2A
00067 #define MFC_PUTBS_CMD           0x29
00068 #define MFC_PUTRF_CMD           0x32
00069 #define MFC_PUTRB_CMD           0x31
00070 #define MFC_PUTL_CMD            0x24
00071 #define MFC_PUTRL_CMD           0x34
00072 #define MFC_PUTLF_CMD           0x26
00073 #define MFC_PUTLB_CMD           0x25
00074 #define MFC_PUTRLF_CMD          0x36
00075 #define MFC_PUTRLB_CMD          0x35
00076 
00077 #define MFC_GET_CMD             0x40
00078 #define MFC_GETS_CMD            0x48
00079 #define MFC_GETF_CMD            0x42
00080 #define MFC_GETB_CMD            0x41
00081 #define MFC_GETFS_CMD           0x4A
00082 #define MFC_GETBS_CMD           0x49
00083 #define MFC_GETL_CMD            0x44
00084 #define MFC_GETLF_CMD           0x46
00085 #define MFC_GETLB_CMD           0x45
00086 
00087 #define MFC_SDCRT_CMD           0x80
00088 #define MFC_SDCRTST_CMD         0x81
00089 #define MFC_SDCRZ_CMD           0x89
00090 #define MFC_SDCRS_CMD           0x8D
00091 #define MFC_SDCRF_CMD           0x8F
00092 
00093 #define MFC_GETLLAR_CMD         0xD0
00094 #define MFC_PUTLLC_CMD          0xB4
00095 #define MFC_PUTLLUC_CMD         0xB0
00096 #define MFC_PUTQLLUC_CMD        0xB8
00097 #define MFC_SNDSIG_CMD          0xA0
00098 #define MFC_SNDSIGB_CMD         0xA1
00099 #define MFC_SNDSIGF_CMD         0xA2
00100 #define MFC_BARRIER_CMD         0xC0
00101 #define MFC_EIEIO_CMD           0xC8
00102 #define MFC_SYNC_CMD            0xCC

00104 /* MFC Tag Status Update definitions for channel 23 (MFC_WrTagUpdate) ------ */
00105 #define MFC_TAG_UPDATE_IMMEDIATE   0x0
00106 #define MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ANY         0x1
00107 #define MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ALL         0x2
00108 #endif /* !MFC_PUT_CMD */

00110 /* MFC_CMDStatus register constants & macros (see BEA 8.3.1) --------------- */
00111 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_MASK          0x03
00112 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC(reg)          (MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_MASK&(reg))
00113 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_SUCCESS_MASK   0x00  
00114 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_ERROR_SEQ_MASK 0x01 
00115 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_ERROR_ENQ_MASK 0x10 
00117 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_CHECK_RC(reg,mask)   \
00118         ((MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC(reg) & (mask)) == (mask))
00119 
00124 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_IS_SUCCESS(reg) \
00125         MFC_CMD_STATUS_CHECK_RC(reg, MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_SUCCESS_MASK)
00126 
00131 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_IS_ERROR(reg) \
00132         (!MFC_CMD_STATUS_CHECK_RC(reg, MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_SUCCESS_MASK))
00133 
00138 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_IS_ERROR_SEQ(reg) \
00139         MFC_CMD_STATUS_CHECK_RC(reg, MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_ERROR_SEQ_MASK)
00140 
00145 #define MFC_CMD_STATUS_IS_ERROR_ENQUEUE(reg) \
00146         MFC_CMD_STATUS_CHECK_RC(reg, MFC_CMD_STATUS_RC_ERROR_ENQ_MASK)
00147 
00148 /* MFC_QStatus register constants & macros (see BEA 8.3.2) ---------------- */
00149 #define MFC_PRXY_STATUS_QUEUE_EMPTY        (1<<31)
00150 #define MFC_PRXY_STATUS_QUEUE_NOT_EMPTY    0x0
00151 
00156 #define MFC_PRXY_STATUS_IS_QUEUE_EMPTY(reg)    (reg != 0x0)
00157 
00159 #define CTK_MFC_PRXY_QUERYTYPE_ANY     1
00160 
00161 #define CTK_MFC_PRXY_QUERYTYPE_ALL     2
00162 
00163 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00167 static inline void CTK_DMA_TAG_SET(int tag, unsigned int *tag_mask) {
00168     (*tag_mask) |= (1 << tag);
00169 }
00170 
00174 static inline int CTK_DMA_TAG_ISSET(int tag, unsigned int *tag_mask) {
00175     return ((*tag_mask) | (1 << tag));
00176 }
00177 
00181 static inline void CTK_DMA_TAG_CLR(int tag, unsigned int *tag_mask) {
00182     (*tag_mask) &= ~(1 << tag);
00183 }
00184 
00188 static inline void CTK_DMA_TAG_ZERO(unsigned int *tag_mask) {
00189     (*tag_mask) = 0x0;
00190 }
00191 
00192 #endif /* _CTK_DMA_COMMON_H */
